text: Lei Yang and Weiwen Jiang’s paper "Co-Exploring Neural Architecture and Network-on-Chip Design for Real-Time Artificial Intelligence” is nominated for Best Paper Award at ASPDAC’20.
Prof. Yiyu Shi receives 2019 IEEE Computer Society TCLVSI Mid-Career Award for his contribution on hardware/software co-exploration for neural architecture design and acceleration.
Dr. Lei Yang joins the SCL as a postdoctoral scholar. Welcome!
